template <typename Block>
struct vsip::impl::Block_layout
File: ../../../vsip/core/block_traits.hpp

Traits class to represent block layout.

Specializations should define the following constants and types:
dim:to be the block dimensionality,
access_type:to be the block's data access type (usually Direct_access_tag or Copy_access_tag),
pack_type:to be the block's packing format,
complex_type:to be the block's complex storage format.
layout_type:to be a Layout type encapsulating the above.

A general definition is provided. Since access_type is Copy_access, the types of order_type, pack_type, and complex_type will not result in incorrect functionality. However, an incorrect order_type might impact performance.

Specializations:
Block_layout<Component_block<Block,Extractor>>
Block_layout<Subset_block<Block>>
Block_layout<Transposed_block<Block>>
Block_layout<Permuted_block<BlockT,PermutionT>>
Block_layout<Sliced_block<Block,Dim>>
Block_layout<Sliced2_block<Block,D1,D2>>
Block_layout<Diag_block<Block>>
Block_layout<Dense_impl<Dim,T,OrderT,ComplexFmt,MapT>>
Block_layout<Dense<Dim,T,OrderT,MapT>>
Block_layout<Fast_block<Dim,T,LP,Map>>
Block_layout<const Fast_block<Dim,T,LP,Map>>
Block_layout<Proxy_local_block<Dim,T,LP>>
Block_layout<Distributed_block<BlockT,MapT>>
Block_layout<Redim_block<BlockT,Dim>>
Block_layout<Us_block<Dim,T,LayoutT,Map>>
